attributes.action: Ban Keziah Featherstone of Bridge Learning Campus in Bristol from teaching againt and arrest and charge her for promoting UKIP as racists.
attributes.additional_details: Ban Keziah Featherstone of Bridge Learning Campus in Bristol from teaching again and arrest and charge her for promoting UKIP as racists. This kind of behavior against ordinary British people branding people as racists has to stop and her comments against us offends me and others so she must be charged as anyone else would be if they were a racist.
